attributes.action: parents decide if they send children to school during second wave without a fine
attributes.additional_details: I have a vulnerable child that I don't want to send to school because I can't afford the fines!!
attributes.background: Don't fine parents for putting their kids lifes and vulnerable family members life first

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Scrap fines for families with vulnerable members that keep children from school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549629
